author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Use the more efficient enum mapping method for the remaining enums.
Also, reorder a few of the Java enums in the new package to match the C
ordering, and update the wrapper methods in the tigris package to
Use the new enum mapping method.
(Action): Add new values, and reorder to reflect C ordering.
(Kind): Reorder value to reflect C ordering.
